Package sagex.phoenix.metadata

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICastMember  
    IMediaArt  
    IMetadata
    Just a PlaceHolder class so that the Phoenix API can auto-generate the API for all Metadata
    IMetadataPersistence
    Abstract way of storing metadata to an alternate location.
    IMetadataProvider  
    IMetadataProviderInfo  
    IMetadataSearchResult  
    IMetadataSupport
    Defines the base Metadata Scanning API that is exposed via the Phoenix APIs

    ISageCustomMetadataRW.FieldName  
    ISageFormatPropertyRO
    7.
    ISageMetadata
    Interface to represent Sage Metadata.
    ISageMetadataALL
    This is a convenience Interface that groups all the other "known" sage metadata interfaces together
    ISagePropertyRO  
    ISagePropertyRW
    Core SAGETV Metadata Properties...
    ISageRolePropertyRW  
    ISageShowInfo
    Sage Metadata that represents the ShowInfo for a given TV show.
    ISeriesInfo
    Represents the Series Info for a given TV Show
    ITVEpisodeResult  
    ITVMetadataProvider
    Extends the normal provider interface to allow for some specific TV operations, such as getting series info

    RatingsManager  
    RefreshMetadataVisitor
    For each media item, get the metadata provider id and refresh fanart/metadata for the item.
